BackstoryDef.label: spacemarine
BackstoryDef.description: Since joining the orbital-deployment shock troop corps [PAWN_nameDef] has fought in countless battles with distinction and honor.\n\nEnemies of the empire fear the spacemarines more than any other imperial force, for good reason.
BackstoryDef.title: Spacemarine

BackstoryDef.label: technical officer
BackstoryDef.description: During [PAWN_possessive] education at the naval academy [PAWN_nameDef] was selected for tech-ops corps. [PAWN_pronoun] was educated in mathematics, science, and technology\n\nThen assigned to the imperial spacemarine corp as a technical officer.
BackstoryDef.title: Technical officer

BackstoryDef.label: medical officer
BackstoryDef.description: During [PAWN_possessive] education at the naval academy [PAWN_nameDef] was selected for the medical corps. [PAWN_pronoun] was educated in surgery, bionics, and combat medicine.\n\nThen assigned to the imperial spacemarine corp as a medical officer.
BackstoryDef.title: Medical officer

BackstoryDef.label: spacemarine captain
BackstoryDef.description: After graduating from the naval academy [PAWN_nameDef] became a commissioned officer in the imperial spacemarine corps.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] was eventually honored for exceptional service and assigned to the orbital-deployment shock troop division.
BackstoryDef.title: Spacemarine captain
